data.comment: The match is underway in Groningen.
Remco Balk for Groningen has been booked by Jannick van der Laan and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 44, Joel Van Kaam (Groningen) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
The first-half is over at Hitachi Capital Mobility Stadium.
In the minute 46, Miguel angel Leal is on a sub for Joel Van Kaam for Groningen.
The home team replace Remco Balk with Ramon-Pascal Lundqvist.
Goal! Ahmed El Messaoudi gives Groningen a 1-0 lead in Groningen.
In the minute 54, Jorgen Strand Larsen instrumental with a fine assist.
At Hitachi Capital Mobility Stadium, Richard van der Venne has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Waalwijk make their first substitution with Lennerd Daneels replacing Ola John.
In the minute 74, Danny Buijs (Groningen) is making a third substitution, with Thijs Dallinga replacing Jorgen Strand Larsen.
Wessel Dammers is replacing Patrick Joosten for the home team.
Goal! Groningen extend their lead to 2-0 through Daniel van Kaam.
In the minute 80, The away team replace Richard van der Venne with Vitalie Damascan.
Waalwijk's Vurnon Anita has been booked in Groningen.
Danny Buijs (Groningen) is making a fifth change, with Thomas Poll replacing the possibly injured Gabriel Gudmundsson.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 2-0.
